cause.description:
When I think of reiki, I think of letting go of illness and creating a scenario that helps people to free themselves from blocks.
Think a minute to consider what your own life would be like if the only way for you to feel better came from a needle and not from the touch of a loved one.
Perhaps taking a reiki class or having a session with a reiki practitioner could help.
http://www.reiki.org/
The International Center for Reiki Training is a non-profit center created to promote the development and education recommended for the pursuit of an ancient, life-preserving way to promote harmony and peace.
1. Educate the world with a sense of respect for an ancient and powerful healing method.
2. Free the blocks in your ki, practice or receive a reiki treatment.
cause.mission: increase the awareness of common people to this ancient ways of helping people heal.
cause.name: Reiki: Universal Life Energy
